description.value:
Replaces Legs, Hips, Pelvis, etc, +2 Toughness Bonus to limb location. Poor halves movement rate (round up) and running requires agility test to not fall over. Good gives Sprint Talent, and +20 to jump/leap tests.

Requirements

Damage works as normal, although inappropriate effects like bleeding just render limb useless

Effect: Scarce / Initiated

Notes: 1500 T 15 R
